tag_list: twitter, instant-messenger, im, real-time, alert, tweet
overview:
At the age of 24, sebastien co-founded, and is currently director of two IT companies. He obtained his Ph.D in Computer Science from the University of Kent (UK) at the age of 25.

He is the co-founder of Astrapia Ltd, the company behind comufy (www.comufy.com), a revolutionary communication platform Allowing companies to communicate with their customers better by leveraging instant messaging technologies and social media strategies.

In November 2009, Comufy launched TweetSwitch, a service allowing users to tweet and receive their tweets in real-time via any instant messenger. The service is available at http://tweetswitch.com.

Sebastien is also co-founder and director of Whizlogic Solutions, a web development company focusing on delivering content management system with bespoke quality designs. After only one year of existence, Whizlogic has an impressive porfolio of clients and offers its clients total satisfaction, through competitive prices and very high quality standards.
